main event: Multiple sightings of UFOs in Trenton, Ohio, including an object with pulsing lights and three erratically flying lights perceived to be under intelligent control.
interesting points: The first sighting involved an oval, bluish-green object that was about 2 feet across and appeared to interact with the horizon over a duration of 1.5 minutes., The second sighting involved three lights that were in erratic flight for 30 minutes with the perception of having intelligent control., Witness reports indicate no sound was heard during these sightings., Local authorities, including the fire department and sheriff's office, received no reports concerning those sightings., The reports came from the vicinity of Trenton and also noted sightings from nearby Hamilton, Ohio.
sighted object: One oval bluish-green object and three erratically flying lights
witness description: Mr. Woodward and another individual observed the UFOs.
